price: Aravuga ati “Nzabasabira imbabazi kuri Nyagasani wanjye. Mu by’ukuri We ni Uhebuje mu kubabarira, Nyirimbabazi.”
arabic: قَالَ سَوۡفَ أَسۡتَغۡفِرُ لَكُمۡ رَبِّيٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla sawfa astaghfiru lakum rabbī innahu huwa al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
